pageContent.description: I'm a software engineer, building (and occasionally designing) user-friendly digital experiences. Currently, I'm working at Starberry as a Software Engineer.
pageContent.shortDescription: I build things for mobile and the web.

pageContent.description:
Hello! My name is Jerome and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in Android and Web Development started back in 2017 when I decided to create a meme app — turns out a meme app taught me a lot about development and digital experiences.
\
\
Fast-forward to today, I've had the privilege to train myself in various bleeding-edge technologies to create amazing digital experiences. Currently, I'm working at Starberry as a Software Engineer.
\
\
Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

jobs.workDescription:
- Design and develop web applications for many clients mostly in the Real-Estate domain.
- Work closely with the design team to create pixel-perfect UI and an exceptional UX.
- Architect and develop Content Management Systems (backend) for web applications.
- Collaborate with other developers to fix bugs and maintain web applications.
- Work closely with the SEO team for maximum optimization and search engine rankings

- Wrote and executed DMLs (mostly SQL) to correct defects and remove blocks from the application
- Worked with Jenkins and Git Version Control Systems to correct defects push changes to UAT and prod CI/CD pipeline of the application
- Worked closely with the client to understand their problems with the application and provide solutions at the earliest possible
- Completed a hands-on three-month training, trained in various technologies such as Java, Spring, Bootstrap, Docker, AWS

- Worked with a team of three software engineer interns and two engineers to design and develop a cross-platform commercial mobile app using the Flutter framework
- Architected the application as a whole and implemented various features of the application
- Designed and implemented a user-friendly UI and design system that provided a convenient user experience to the end-user
- Single-handedly implemented the Login/SignUp authentication system of the application

projects.description: A single-page application where you can know more about me and my career.
projects.name: Portfolio

projects.description: A Facebook clone, replicated the front-end and the back-end using the MERN stack.
projects.name: Zero Hub

projects.description: An API that handles all the functionalities of a note-taking / task-managing app. A login system is also implemented for multi-user support.
projects.name: Task Manager (API)

projects.description: A cross-platform (hybrid) mobile app which shows the musical chords of songs. This app is beautifully designed with the Neumorphic design system.
projects.name: Chord Book

projects.description: A web application to manage the attendance of students in my UG college. This app aimed to let the teachers take and manage the attendance of students through their mobile or PC through the web.
projects.name: Attendance Management System

projects.description: A native android application that I developed for an event in my UG. Has a custom-built UI with many cool animations.
projects.name: Crypto 2k18

pageContent.description: Currently I'm looking forward for challenging oppurtutnities and I'm open to your call! My mailbox always welcomes your interest. I’ll try my best to get back to you!
